job.title: Machine Learning Systems Engineer
job.description: pAirHop Communications is a world recognized leader in wireless network automation and optimization technology platforms and solutionsnbspWe are seeking a Machine Learning ML Systems Engineer who will develop algorithms using advanced ML techniques to optimize the Radio Access Network RANppbrppstrongJob ResponsibilitiesstrongpulliDevelop ML algorithms to optimize the performance of the 4G5G Radio Access NetworkliliDevelop simulations test scenarios and experiments to validate ML solutions in collaboration with the system engineering teamliliCollaborate with other engineering teams to implement and deploy ML algorithms in live networksliliValidate and monitor ML solution performance in field tests and live networkliliStay current with relevant developments in the ML fieldliulpnbspppstrongQualificationsstrongppThe position requirespulliMasters in engineering computer science or equivalent PhD preferredliliAt least 2 years of experience developing ML solutionsliliDeep understanding of machine learning tools and algorithmsliliExcellent knowledge of Python and Pandas is a mustliliExperience with Pytorch is a plusliliExperience with reinforcement learning time series analysis and Graph Neural Networks is a plusliliExperience in 4G and 5G cellular Radio Access Networks RAN is a plusliulpbrppstrongAbout the companystrongppPlease see wwwairhopcommcomp
